Audio.Locality: Reserva Ecológica de Guapi Açu (REGUA), RJ
Audio.Author: Eric DeFonso
Audio.Comments: Natural song from an unseen bird in less disturbed area, near a broad, buttressed tree by the trail. Short break toward the end of the cut was about 30 seconds. Recorded along the Green trail which is away from the main lodge grounds and wetlands and heads into the higher hills in the reserve.bird-seen:noplayback-used:no""
